name: Trickstar Noble Angel
text:
2 "Trickstar" monsters
If this card is Link Summoned: You can add 1 "Blue Tears" card from your Deck to your hand. If you have a Fusion Monster on your field or in your GY: You can target 1 "Trickstar" monster in your GY; Special Summon it. If either player takes effect damage: You can target 1 face-up card on the field; destroy it. You can only use each effect of "Trickstar Noble Angel" once per turn.
